nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL STORM STRENGTHENS SLIGHTLY AND NEARING HURRICANE STRENGTH... ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FOR THE BIG ISLAND...
summary:
...TROPICAL STORM STRENGTHENS SLIGHTLY AND NEARING HURRICANE STRENGTH... ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FOR THE BIG ISLAND...
 As of 8:00 PM HST Sat Aug 24
 the center of Hone was located near 18.1, -154.8
 with movement W at 15 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 991 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 70 mph.
